WorkItem.Description:
My objective is to listen for any adds/updates/resets/removes within any of my custom Region Adapters within my application as such I was thinking that I would listen to the RegionManager.UpdatingRegions event however the sender is always null.
Â 
What is the best way to subscribe to changes within my custom region adapters?

Comments.Message:
Hi,

For this purpose, you could try subscribing to your region's Views Collection's CollectionChanged event; this event will be fired with each adds/updates/resets/removes in your collection of views inside a region.

As this is not an issue in Prism, if you need more information about this, you could create a thread in the discussions section where we will provide you with further support on the subject.

I hope you find this helpful.

Guido Leandro Maliandi
http://blogs.southworks.net/gmaliandi
